H0.text: Who penned his own epitaph ‘Here lies one whose name was writ in water’. Percy Bysshe Shelley

H1.text: Who penned his own epitaph ‘Here lies one whose name was writ in water’. Lord Byron

H2.text: Who penned his own epitaph ‘Here lies one whose name was writ in water’. John Donne

H3.text: Who penned his own epitaph ‘Here lies one whose name was writ in water’. Keats

A4.text: The memorial statue of him by Nicholas Stone was erected with a Latin epigraph probably composed by himself.
